title: A Ship on the Horizon (Premium)
description:

A Ship on the Horizon
Tonight's story takes us back in time to the sandy blue shoreline of the Mediterranean Sea. It is a tale from Greek mythology, with love and compassion at its heart, adapted to help you drift off peacefully. ğŸ˜´Â

itunes:title: A Ship on the Horizon (Premium)
itunes:author: Slumber Studios
itunes:subtitle: Narrated by Thomas Jones. Our adaptation of a mythological love story, set on the shores of the Mediterranean, which tells of how the kingfisher bird came to be.
